content: jacob s coaster by becky simmons copyright december 2023 glossary of terms and notes this pattern does not include turning chains do whatever technique you prefer for getting your hook to the right height and count that as double_crochet for the first 3 rounds on the optional r4 do whatever you normally do for a single_crochet round if doing ch1 don t count it as a stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch yarn worsted weight cotton sample used bernat single_crochet single_crochet handicrafter cotton 2sc work 2 single_crochet stitches into one stitch double_crochet double_crochet hook appropriate for yarn sample used 5 5mm 2dc work 2 double_crochet stitches into one optional a large hook to help with the laddering stitch up process i used an 8mm quintr quintuple triple yo 6 times insert hook and pull up a loop yo pull through two loops total yardage 20 yards includes optional round until you are back to one loop on the hook coaster pattern r1 12dc join to turning chain with a slip_stitch r2 2dc 12 times join to turning chain with a slip_stitch r3 1dc 1dc and 1quintr in next stitch 11 times 1dc in next two stitches ch10 cut yarn ladder up the quintr stitches starting with the first one made be careful not to twist the quintrs take ch10 and weave through the first ladder as so insert ch10 back to front in the previous ladder loop then around the base legs of the first ladder loop then front to back through previous loop then join with a slip_stitch to the same stitch as your last double_crochet if you don t do r4 while weaving in your outside end sew the base of the ch10 to the top of your turning chain picture tutorial below r4 optional start away from where your other rounds started 2sc 1sc in next 5 sts 6 times when you get to where r3 was supposed to be joined just crochet normally following the pattern do a single_crochet or 2sc in the base of the ch10 and do the next into your turning chain for the previous round join to turning chain with a slip_stitch picture tutorial below slightly bigger coaster by becky simmons copyright december 2023 glossary of terms and notes this pattern does not include turning chains do whatever technique you prefer for getting your hook to the right height and count that as double_crochet for the first 3 rounds on the optional r5 do whatever you normally do for a single_crochet round if doing ch1 don t count it as a stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch yarn worsted weight cotton sample used bernat single_crochet single_crochet handicrafter cotton 2sc work 2 single_crochet stitches into one stitch hook appropriate for yarn sample used 5 5mm optional double_crochet double_crochet a large hook to help with the laddering up process i used an 2dc work 2 double_crochet stitches into one stitch 8mm quintr quintuple triple yo 6 times insert hook and pull up a loop yo pull through two loops until
